使用train1的scan列表，总共27000多张图跑了8k多张，1个epoch，进行test后结果如下
Epoch 1/1: {'2mm_abs': 0.8238551793291147, '2mm_acc': 0.6288468643339912, '3mm_abs': 1.0412098757939545, '3mm_acc': 0.7245598857118777, '4mm_abs': 1.1918990389019453, '4mm_acc': 0.7712087103409755, '20mm_abs': 2.3825005494567386, '20mm_acc': 0.9074936085557104}
